name: Johan Harding
description: Formanden - og den store nørd. Jeg har været med i Fafner fra starten og har stort set spillet rollespil hele mit liv. Både bordrollespil og live. Jeg er eventmager og historiefortæller og jeg mener at rollespil skal være sjovt, lærerigt, udfordrende - og en lille smule uhyggeligt. Både for børn og voksne

name: Rikke Timmermann
description: I am vice chairman of Fafner. Why role-playing? Because there is community, coziness, personal development and you are allowed to be who you want to be. I like to plan and make great experiences for children, so why not combine it with something you are passionate about for? Role play, the slightly nerdy and weird, as well as fun with the kids both inside and out.

name: Stig Bach
description: A parent who, among other things, loves nature, fantasy, music and having fun with his children. Completely inexperienced, I threw myself, perhaps therefore naturally enough, into role-playing, exceeded a limit or two, and have now for years enjoyed myself. with all the wonderful adults and children in Fafner, both as a deputy, but also as a lot of creatures / personalities. In addition to the live role-playing game itself, I have loved making physical scenery and soundscapes.
